workshoptitle: Get Started with Oracle Cloud Infrastructure Data Integration

tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: Introduction to OCI Data Integration LiveLab.

tutorials.title: Get Started
tutorials.description: This is the prerequisites for customers using Free Trial and Paid tenancies, and Always Free accounts (if applicable). The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.title: Lab 0: Setting up the Data Integration prerequisites in OCI
Lab 1: Create an OCI Data Integration Workspace
Lab 2: Create the Object Storage and ADW Data Assets
Lab 3: Create a Data Loader task, two Data Flows, Integration tasks and a SQL task
Lab 4: Create an Application, a Pipeline and publish tasks
Lab 5: Run Data Loader task, schedule and run Pipeline task
Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
